issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: [Java] StructVector's child vectors get unexpectedly reordered after adding vectors with duplicated fields

comments.body:
How was the conflict policy set? [https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/8e43f23dcc6a9e630516228f110c48b64d13cec6/java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/complex/AbstractStructVector.java#L44-L78] 

CC [~dsusanibara] this would be something good to document
Though actually, none of those policies should result in reordering fields.

To me the issue was found when CONFLICT_APPEND is used. I can add more test cases for CONFLICT_REPLACE.

By the way I believe in future may be we can deprecate the "addOrGet()" API [https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/8e43f23dcc6a9e630516228f110c48b64d13cec6/java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/complex/AbstractStructVector.java#L148-L174], which seems to overlap the functionality of `CONFLICT_IGNORE`.
